item.title: 6 SEO updates you need to know about
item.dc:creator: kate
item.description:
As someone who teaches Search Engine Optimisation (SEO), I know the biggest worry many business owners have is keeping up with Google’s algorithm changes so you can maintain your rankings. Staying on top of the latest SEO news is essential in our competitive digital world. So I’ve compiled some of the most recent updates in […]

item.title: 7 super simple SEO tips for small business

item.description:
